original_title: Sandy & Junior: Quatro Estações - O Show
overview: The DVD was recorded live at Olympia, Sao Paulo on July 17, 2000. The show features the duo's greatest hits. The concept, which is based on the four climatic seasons of the year, brought innovations such as the effect of snow in winter, leaves in autumn, coconut smell representing summer and many other special effects using big screens. It is one of the best selling albums of all time in Brazil, with more than three million copies sold.
title: Sandy & Junior: Quatro Estações - O Show
